name: Blizzard Arcade Collection
overview: Blizzard Arcade Collection is a compilation of three remastered titles from the early days of the company Blizzard Entertainment, available for the console platforms listed here for the first time. The three games are: Blackthorne The Lost Vikings Rock n' Roll Racing For each game, two separate original editions are included as well as a third remastered edition. The original editions contain quality of life improvements like the ability to set custom bindings, rewind gameplay up to ten seconds, save and load as well as watch playthroughs for Blackthorne and The Lost Vikings.
